home.heroSubtitle: One platform to automate operations, understand your data, secure your business, and outsmart the competition.
home.onWaitlist: You're on the list! We'll be in touch soon.
home.connectsWithTools: Connects with the tools you already use
home.valuePropSubtitle: Most businesses waste hours every week on manual tasks and scattered data. Binelek brings everything together.
home.benefitAiFirstDesc: Ask questions in plain English. No complex queries or dashboards to learn.
home.benefitUnifiedDataDesc: All your business data in one place. No more switching between apps.
home.benefitEnterpriseSecurityDesc: Bank-level security built in. SOC2 compliant from day one.
home.benefitActionableInsightsDesc: Not just data, but recommendations. Know what to do next.
home.hubsSubtitle: From insights to action, with full data confidence.
home.hubInsightsDesc: AI-powered analytics that tell the story behind your numbers. Unified dashboards, predictions, and customer segmentation.
home.hubActionDesc: Test decisions before you make them. Strategic planning with causal simulation and automated workflows.
home.hubDataLineageDesc: Complete visibility into your data's journey. Quality scores, provenance tracking, and audit-ready documentation.
home.modulesSubtitle: Everything you need to run your business smarter, faster, and more securely.
home.moduleOpsCopilotDesc: AI-powered task management and workflow automation. Create automations with natural language, not complicated flowcharts.
home.moduleMiniFoundryDesc: Business intelligence without the learning curve. Connect your data sources and ask questions in plain English.
home.moduleSecurityDesc: Enterprise-grade security made simple. Continuous monitoring with actionable recommendations.
home.moduleMarketplaceDesc: Know what competitors charge before your customers do. Real-time price tracking across marketplaces.
home.modulePredictiveTagline: See the future of your business
home.modulePredictiveDesc: AI-powered forecasting for sales, inventory, and customer behavior. Make decisions before problems happen.
home.howItWorksSubtitle: No complex setup. No engineering team required.
home.step1Desc: Link Shopify, QuickBooks, Stripe, and more in just a few clicks. No engineering required.
home.step2Desc: "What was my revenue last month?" "Send a follow-up email to John." Just ask.
home.step3Desc: Set up workflows that run automatically. Focus on growth, not busywork.
home.aiDemoSubtitle: No dashboards to navigate. No reports to generate. Just ask questions in plain English.
home.aiDemoQuestion: What was my best-selling product last month?
home.aiDemoAnswer: Your best-selling product in October was Widget Pro with 847 units sold, generating $42,350 in revenue. That's up 23% from September.
home.aiDemoFollowup: Would you like me to show you the full product performance report?
home.earlyAccessSubtitle: We're launching soon. Join the waitlist to get early access, exclusive pricing, and help shape the product.
home.welcomeAboard: Welcome aboard! Check your email for next steps.
home.ctaSubheadline: Join hundreds of businesses already on the waitlist. Get notified when we launch.

pricing.title: Simple, transparent pricing
pricing.subtitle: Start free. Scale as you grow.

faq.billingAnswer: We bill monthly or annually depending on your choice. Annual plans save up to 20%.
faq.changePlansAnswer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately.
faq.limitsQuestion: What happens if I exceed limits?
faq.limitsAnswer: We'll notify you when you're approaching limits. You can upgrade anytime to continue without interruption.
faq.trialAnswer: Yes! Our Starter plan is free forever. You can also request a demo to see the full platform.
faq.cancelAnswer: You can cancel anytime from your account settings. No questions asked.
faq.currencyAnswer: We accept payments in USD and EUR. Prices are automatically shown in your local currency based on your region.

footer.newsletterText: Get product updates and news delivered to your inbox.
footer.subscribeSuccess: You're subscribed! We'll keep you updated.

overview.heroTitle: Everything your business needs. One platform.
overview.heroSubtitle: Three powerful hubs that work together to help you understand, act, and trust your data.
overview.hubsSubtitle: From insights to action, with full data confidence. Each hub is designed to help you make better decisions.
overview.modulesSubtitle: Specialized modules that integrate seamlessly with the hub architecture.
overview.aiSubtitle: Ask questions in plain English and get answers from all your connected data.
overview.aiQuestion: What was my revenue this month?
overview.aiAnswer: Your revenue this month is $47,832, up 12% from last month. Your top-selling product is Widget Pro, accounting for 34% of sales.

opsCopilot.heroTitle: Automate the work that slows you down
opsCopilot.heroSubtitle: Create automations with plain English. No flowcharts required.
opsCopilot.taskAutomationDesc: Schedule recurring tasks and trigger actions on events. Set it and forget it.
opsCopilot.emailAutomationDesc: AI-drafted emails based on templates and business rules. Never write the same email twice.
opsCopilot.workflowBuilderDesc: Visual drag-and-drop for multi-step processes. Connect actions without code.
opsCopilot.useCase2: Follow up with leads 3 days after contact
opsCopilot.useCase3: Generate and send weekly sales reports
opsCopilot.useCase5: Create tasks when support tickets are opened
opsCopilot.differentiationTitle: Automate with words, not complicated flowcharts
opsCopilot.differentiationDesc: Traditional automation tools require technical setup and complex flowcharts. With Binelek, just describe what you want to happen in plain English, and we'll make it work.
opsCopilot.exampleText: Every Monday at 9am, send me a summary of last week's sales and any overdue invoices.

miniFoundry.heroSubtitle: Beautiful dashboards without the learning curve.
miniFoundry.dataConsolidationDesc: Connect all your sources and see everything in one place. No more switching between apps.
miniFoundry.customDashboardsDesc: Drag-and-drop builder with pre-built templates. Create beautiful visualizations in minutes.
miniFoundry.automatedReportsDesc: Schedule daily, weekly, or monthly reports. Delivered to your inbox automatically.
miniFoundry.query1: What was my revenue this month?
miniFoundry.query2: Show me top customers by order value
miniFoundry.query3: Compare this quarter to last quarter
miniFoundry.templatesTitle: Pre-built templates to get started fast
miniFoundry.differentiationTitle: Business intelligence without the learning curve
miniFoundry.differentiationDesc: No SQL. No data engineering. No consultants. Connect your tools, and start asking questions immediately.

security.heroTitle: Enterprise security, without the enterprise price
security.heroSubtitle: Know your security posture. Fix issues before they become problems.
security.securityScoreDesc: A 0-100 composite score updated continuously. Know exactly where you stand.
security.vulnerabilityScanningDesc: Automated detection of security gaps. Find issues before they become problems.
security.complianceReportingDesc: SOC2, GDPR, HIPAA, PCI-DSS ready reports. Prove your security posture.
security.mfaMonitoringDesc: Track which accounts have MFA enabled. Close authentication gaps.
security.stepByStepDesc: Don't just know about problems — know exactly how to fix them.
security.mfaNotEnabled: MFA not enabled for admin account
security.mfaFixInstructions: Go to Settings → Security → Multi-Factor Authentication and enable MFA for the following accounts: admin@company.com, ceo@company.com
security.differentiationTitle: Enterprise security made simple for growing businesses
security.differentiationDesc: Security is included in every plan, not an expensive add-on. Because protecting your business shouldn't be optional.

marketplace.heroTitle: Know what competitors charge before your customers do
marketplace.heroSubtitle: Real-time price tracking across every marketplace.
marketplace.priceTrackingDesc: Monitor competitor prices every 4 hours. Never miss a price change.
marketplace.competitorDiscoveryDesc: Find competitors by location or product similarity. Know your market.
marketplace.marketTrendsDesc: See pricing patterns and opportunities. Stay ahead of the curve.
marketplace.priceAlertsDesc: Get notified when competitors change prices. React in real-time.
marketplace.useCase1: Track competitor pricing on key products
marketplace.differentiationTitle: Competitive intelligence as part of your command center
marketplace.differentiationDesc: Not a standalone tool — integrated with your other business data. See how pricing affects your revenue, all in one place.

predictive.heroTitle: Know what's coming before it happens
predictive.heroSubtitle: AI-powered predictions for sales, inventory, and customer behavior.
predictive.salesForecastingDesc: Predict future revenue with AI models trained on your historical data. Know your best and worst months before they happen.
predictive.inventoryPredictionDesc: Never run out of stock again. AI predicts demand and tells you exactly when to reorder.
predictive.churnPreventionDesc: Identify at-risk customers before they leave. Get actionable recommendations to keep them.
predictive.customConnectorsDesc: Connect any data source with our flexible custom connector builder. REST APIs, databases, SFTP — we handle it all.
predictive.useCase2: Which products will sell out this quarter
predictive.useCase3: Which customers are likely to churn
predictive.step1Desc: Link your existing tools or build custom connectors for any data source.
predictive.step2Desc: Our models analyze your historical data to understand your business rhythms.
predictive.step3Desc: Receive accurate forecasts and actionable recommendations automatically.
predictive.query1: What will my revenue be next month?
predictive.query2: Which customers are likely to churn?
predictive.query4: What's the best price for this product?
predictive.query5: Which products will sell best in Q4?
predictive.accuracyDesc: Track accuracy over time. See how our predictions compare to actual results. Continuously improving models that get smarter with your data.
predictive.customConnectorsDesc: Our unique custom connector builder lets you connect proprietary systems, legacy databases, or any API — no coding required.
predictive.differentiationTitle: Predictions integrated with your entire business
predictive.differentiationDesc: Not just standalone forecasts — predictions that connect to your workflows. Automatically trigger actions when predictions change.

whyBinelek.heroSubtitle: Most businesses juggle separate tools for tasks, dashboards, security, and market research. Binelek brings it all together.
whyBinelek.oldWay1: Spreadsheets for tracking, another app for tasks, another for dashboards
whyBinelek.binelekWay5: AI that sees your whole business
whyBinelek.aiDesc: Most 'AI-powered' tools just add a chatbot. Binelek's AI understands your entire business — your sales, your operations, your security, your competition — and gives you answers that matter.
whyBinelek.noTechnicalDesc: Connect your tools in minutes, not days. No data engineers. No SQL queries. No consultants. Just connect and go.
whyBinelek.builtForGrowingDesc: Enterprise platforms are overkill. Basic tools don't scale. Binelek gives you powerful capabilities sized right for your business — and your budget.
whyBinelek.securityIncludedDesc: Most platforms treat security as an afterthought — or an expensive add-on. Binelek monitors your security posture automatically, because protecting your business shouldn't be optional.
whyBinelek.joinHundreds: Join hundreds of businesses simplifying their operations with Binelek.
whyBinelek.seeItInActionSubheadline: Book a personalized demo to see how Binelek can work for your business.

about.heroSubtitle: We believe every growing business deserves the tools that used to be reserved for enterprises — without the complexity or the price tag.
about.missionText: Empower small and medium businesses with enterprise-grade AI tools that make business operations effortless.
about.storyP1: We started Binelek because we saw a gap in the market. Enterprise companies have access to incredible tools — AI-powered analytics, automated workflows, sophisticated security monitoring, and competitive intelligence. But small and medium businesses? They're stuck with spreadsheets, disconnected apps, and manual processes.
about.storyP2: We knew there had to be a better way. So we built Binelek — a unified platform that brings enterprise capabilities to growing businesses, without the enterprise complexity or price tag.
about.storyP3: Today, Binelek aims to help hundreds of businesses run smarter, faster, and more securely. And we're just getting started.
about.value1Desc: We believe powerful tools should be easy to use. If it's complicated, we haven't finished designing it.
about.value2Desc: Clear pricing, honest communication, and no hidden agendas. What you see is what you get.
about.value3Desc: Your success is our success. We measure ourselves by the value we create for your business.
about.value4Desc: Security isn't an add-on — it's built into everything we do from day one.
about.getInTouchSubtitle: Have questions? We'd love to hear from you.
about.joinTeamSubtitle: We're building the future of business software. Want to help?

contact.heroSubtitle: Have a question, feedback, or want to learn more about Binelek? We're here to help.
contact.enterpriseSubtitle: Looking for custom pricing, dedicated support, or specific compliance requirements?
contact.subject: Subject
contact.getEarlyAccessDesc: See Binelek in action with a personalized walkthrough.
contact.systemStatusDesc: Check our current system status and uptime.

careers.heroSubtitle: We're building the future of business software for SMBs. Want to help?
careers.whyBinelekP1: At Binelek, we're on a mission to democratize enterprise-grade tools for small and medium businesses. We believe every growing company deserves access to the same powerful AI, analytics, and automation capabilities that Fortune 500 companies have.
careers.whyBinelekP2: We're a small, passionate team that moves fast and values impact over process. If you want to work on challenging problems with talented people and see your work make a real difference, we'd love to hear from you.
careers.noOpenPositions: We don't have any open positions right now, but we're always looking for talented people.
careers.ctaSubheadline: Check out Binelek for your business instead. Sign up to be notified when we launch.

faq.heroSubtitle: Everything you need to know about Binelek.
faq.ctaSubheadline: Schedule a demo and we'll answer all your questions personally.
faq.a1: Binelek is an AI-powered command center for small and medium businesses. It brings together task automation, business intelligence, security monitoring, and competitive intelligence in one platform.
faq.a2: Binelek is designed for growing SMBs with 10-200 employees. It's perfect for business owners and operations managers who want enterprise capabilities without enterprise complexity.
faq.q3: How is Binelek different from other tools?
faq.a3: Unlike piecemeal solutions, Binelek brings everything together in one platform with a unified AI that understands your entire business. You can ask questions in plain English and get answers from all your connected data.
faq.q4: Do I need technical skills to use Binelek?
faq.a4: No! Binelek is designed for non-technical users. Everything can be done through natural language queries and visual interfaces. No SQL, no coding required.
faq.a5: We offer a free Starter plan, Pro at $49/month, Business at $149/month, and custom Enterprise pricing. Annual plans save 20%.
faq.a6: Yes! Our Starter plan is free forever and includes 2 connectors and 50 AI queries per month.
faq.q7: How does the free trial work?
faq.a7: You can start with our free Starter plan immediately. For a full demo of Pro/Business features, schedule a demo with our team.
faq.q8: Can I change my plan later?
faq.a8: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade at any time. Changes take effect immediately.
faq.q9: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.a9: We accept all major credit cards and can arrange invoicing for Enterprise customers.
faq.q10: How do I cancel my subscription?
faq.a10: You can cancel anytime from your account settings. No questions asked, no hidden fees.
faq.a11: Yes. We use industry-standard encryption (AES-256 at rest, TLS 1.3 in transit) and follow security best practices. Your data is isolated in a multi-tenant architecture.
faq.a12: Data is stored in secure cloud infrastructure (AWS) with data centers in the US. Enterprise customers can request specific regions.
faq.a13: Absolutely not. Your data is yours. We never sell, share, or use your data for advertising.
faq.a14: Yes. You can request complete data deletion at any time, and we'll remove all your data within 30 days.
faq.q15: What tools does Binelek integrate with?
faq.a15: We integrate with Shopify, QuickBooks, Stripe, HubSpot, Square, Xero, Zoho, Gmail, Outlook, and more. Check our Integrations page for the full list.
faq.q16: How do I connect my tools?
faq.a16: Most integrations use OAuth — just click to connect and authorize access. Your data starts syncing automatically within minutes.
faq.q17: What if I need an integration you don't have?
faq.a17: Contact us! We're constantly adding new integrations based on customer requests. Enterprise customers can also request custom integrations.
faq.a18: Depends on your plan: Starter syncs every 24 hours, Pro every hour, and Business/Enterprise get real-time sync.
faq.a19: Our AI understands natural language and can query across all your connected data sources. Ask questions like 'What was my revenue this month?' and get instant answers.
faq.q20: Can I use Binelek without the AI features?
faq.a20: Yes! While AI is a core feature, you can also use traditional dashboards, manual workflows, and visual builders without using natural language queries.
faq.q21: How accurate are the AI responses?
faq.a21: Our AI pulls directly from your connected data sources, so answers are based on your real data. We always show the source so you can verify.
faq.q22: What data does the AI have access to?
faq.a22: The AI only has access to data you've connected. It cannot access anything outside your authorized integrations.

gettingStarted.heroSubtitle: Everything you need to get started with Binelek.
gettingStarted.step1Desc: Sign up with your email and set up your workspace. Takes less than a minute.
gettingStarted.step2Desc: Link Shopify, QuickBooks, or any of our supported integrations via OAuth.
